title: Publish updated Valentine home prompt text

requirements.summary: Ensure the deployed/public Valentine page shows the exact updated home-screen prompt text and includes basic cache-busting guidance to help users see the latest published version at the shareable link.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening https://caffeine.ai/chat/019c2016-f519-7768-a217-0bd548a606d8 shows the latest deployed version (not a draft-only state).
The home screen main prompt text displays exactly: "Maniha will you be my valentines".
A hard refresh / incognito window still shows the updated deployed content.

file_operations.description: Confirm the home screen main prompt text renders exactly "Maniha will you be my valentines" (including capitalization and spelling) and centralize it as a single constant to prevent accidental divergence during future edits.
Add standard no-cache meta headers (Cache-Control/Pragma/Expires) to reduce the chance of stale cached HTML after publishing, improving reliability of hard refresh/incognito validation.

Document the minimal publish/release checklist for making the current version live (build, publish, and post-deploy verification steps including hard refresh/incognito checks against the shareable link).
